title: Metro Line Construction Phase 2
description: Ongoing construction near MG Road, improving connectivity.

title: Flyover Work at Hebbal
description: Flyover being built to reduce traffic congestion and improve travel time.

title: Metro Station Expansion at MG Road
description: Construction of new metro exit/entry points and escalators at MG Road Metro Station to ease commuter traffic.

title: Smart Traffic Signal Implementation
description: Installation of AI-based adaptive traffic signals for smoother flow at Brigade Road junction.

title: Footpath Revamp Project
description: Redesign and construction of pedestrian-friendly footpaths under TenderSURE standards.

title: New BMTC Bus Depot
description: Establishing a new eco-friendly BMTC depot with EV charging stations.

title: Flyover Maintenance Work
description: Structural reinforcement and resurfacing of Hebbal Flyover to support heavy traffic loads.

title: IT Park Road Expansion
description: Widening of approach roads to Manyata Tech Park with drainage and lighting improvements.

title: Sewage Line Upgrade
description: Laying of underground sewage pipelines to improve sanitation infrastructure.
owner: BWSSB (Bangalore Water Supply and Sewerage Board)

title: Underground Power Cabling
description: Replacing overhead cables with underground lines to reduce outages.

title: Storm Water Drain Reconstruction
description: Widening of storm water drains to prevent monsoon flooding in residential layouts.
